meanings.definition: The quality or state of being narrow.
meanings.sent1: The narrownesses of the hallway made it difficult for two people to walk side by side.
meanings.sent2: The narrownesses of the road caused traffic congestion during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: The narrownesses of the elevator led to some comical situations when trying to fit in with a large group.
meanings.sent4: The narrownesses of her mind prevented her from seeing different perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The narrownesses of the canyon walls created a sense of claustrophobia for the hikers.

meanings.sent1: The narrownesses of the alley made it feel cramped and dark.
meanings.sent2: The narrownesses of the stream made it challenging for the fish to swim upstream.
meanings.sent3: The narrownesses of the doorway caused a funny moment when two people tried to enter at the same time.
meanings.sent4: The narrownesses of the tunnel made it seem like a never-ending journey.
meanings.sent5: The narrownesses of the gap between the rocks required careful navigation for the climbers.
